It wasn't so long ago. {nl}I felt a strange energy while experimenting near the Closed Area. {nl}It was quite different from magic I know of. It was very warm.{nl}
You came. Please get some dust samples from the Hallowventers.{nl}There are many reasons that a plague could spread.
There was one testee who melted the Piece of Ice from the instant it touched.{nl}To be honest... that is a feat in itself.
I am so bitter and resentful about myself...{nl}How I could only watch as the demons defiled the monastery...
We have no choice but to try a dirty method.{nl}We will need to use some corrupt energy sources to weaken the powerful divine power.{nl}
The neighboring village had been ransacked.{nl}I could not help but think that the even the goddesses had forsaken us.{nl}
You can't recieve any support from Orsha without having a refugee status.{nl}They know that they will all starve without support so that's why they're all waiting.
It's so sad that we have to be developing the land around Klaipeda...{nl}I'm worried that some of the monsters will come running towards us since they've lost their habitats.
And he wants to stop the girl from meeting the Revelator...?{nl}
We've been fooled before, we can't help but be suspicious.
And to save you...{nl}You had to be hidden amongst all the Revelators. There was no other way.{nl}
The Saugas split their loot fairly among themselves.{nl}Maybe we can find some clues from them.
I guess what I saw was an illusion.{nl}I must reward you for protecting a mineralogist like me.{nl}
As a cleric, the best way to approach the goddesses is to serve others.{nl}If you help me heal the soldiers at Miners' Village, I will gladly help you back.
It's very sad to listen to the commands of demons as the Guardians of the tomb.
I came here because the historians invited me to this place.{nl}They wanted my advice as a stonemason.
I heard a Revelator defeated the Demon Lord ransacking the Royal Mausoleum.{nl}As a person undergoing training, I am ashamed that I couldn't go out and fight.
I heard the monsters in Kateen Forest are eating up the Owl Sculptures I've made. {nl}I'm sure they are trying to use the souls for something else. Like for nourishment...
As a Hunter, my instinct says the monsters in this forest are showing unusual movement. {nl}As if they are controlled by something.
Don't just stand there. {nl}Move if you want to help or go away.
As the mayor, I cannot just leave the village like this. {nl}How could the goddesses be so indifferent?
I have already memorized most of them, but the ones left are really important.{nl}They contain information on how to enter the Royal Mausoleum and such.
This was prepared for releasing the seals in Tiltas Valley. {nl}The sap was collected little by little over centuries, so please handle it with care.

As I walked this land as a bystander, I read the epitaphs of my predecessors.{nl}Long ago, Ruklys tried to accomplish a revolution,{nl}Lydia Schaffen also formed her forces, and they still remain to this day.
I will be able to guide you to the revelation if I use all the strength left in me. {nl}That is why you should release me.
It seems some magical power is draining the life force out of living humans to extract souls...{nl}I have lived in this forest for many years but this is unheard of.{nl}
Hmm... I think the  Ashaq Underground Prison or the Novaha Monastery would be too easy.{nl}The  more danger there lurks, there higher your score will be.
In order to fend off fire property monsters, you must strike them down with greater   force.{nl}Or you must utilize other properties of magic.

If the magic circles are really a lie, then you should be able to remove the magic circles at Tylila Path with the goddess' power. {nl}I mean something like the Goddess Statue. Is there any way to get it?
Hmm, have you ever seen the Great Cathedral or Mage Tower before?{nl}Or something like the gigantic Goddess Statue of Fedimian?{nl}
While I am polishing up the materials, I don't want to see your face.{nl}How about defeating the monsters that make the place around here messy.
We and the Anastospa have different opinions, but we are not hostile to each other.{nl}Ever since the unknown name came out, it's apparent that we suspect it.{nl}
What is this? I see one Kupole, but I hear two personalities.{nl}I should try talking to them again.
I should follow Kupole Medena and go inside the Tevhrin Stalactite Cave.
Kupole Trija
Oh, right.{nl}If you put together the pieces of the Magic Core we might just be able to use it.{nl}Would you collect the fragments of the Magic Core?

{nl}The Magic Core pieces should be spread around outside of this vacant lot.{nl}If the goal was to destroy the Teleportation Magic Circle, the broken pieces of the Magic Core will have been thrown away there.
Serija must regain her energy for us to know about the goddess.{nl}You should go.
Follow Serija and go to section 3!
Serija will know what to do.
Revelator, do you wish for my help?
The goddess must be conscious still...
Ah... The Teleportation Magic Circle cannot be used now.{nl}The Tala destroyed its Magic Core when they attacked.
{nl}The Tala weren't always like this, but for some reason they sided with the demons.{nl}My strength wasn't enough to protect the magic circle from both of them...
Thank you, Trija.
There is a Holy Place of Recovery at the Antra Vacant Lot,
{nl}There you can receive good energy to help you heal and recover.{nl}Serija can't move by herself yet, so I ask that you bring us some of that energy.
I just hope the demons haven't taken the Holy Place of Recovery yet...
Kupole Serija
Won't it all be over now...?{nl}Please, tell me as soon as you find any traces of Dalia...
But you must go.{nl}The goddess must be saved.
{nl}Whatever it takes...
Is it... Is that really okay...?
Do not worry, Serija.{nl}The Revelator and I will rescue Dalia.
{nl}You should stay here and recover your strength.
I feel so sorry...{nl}But now I'm certain that only the Revelator can save the goddess...
If only the goddess still has her conscience, I can communicate with Her.{nl}I'll prepare to speak to Her. Warn me when you're ready.
Serija has calmed down now.{nl}We should start by searching this area.
Yes.{nl}The withering leaves and excessive vegetation of this forest are problems Aeglei and I have long argued over.{nl}
Why do you ask?{nl}
The inside of our house is a complete chaos and there's demon footprints everywhere.{nl}I couldn't find any notes either.{nl}
We can't give   up.{nl}Maybe we're just not seeing the rest of the beads.{nl}They could've   been kicked out of the way by monsters or...{nl}
The demons may scare me, but as a herb gatherer I can't let this go.{nl}I think it's best to   destroy all the Aconites.{nl}
This wizard... He's sided with the demons.{nl}Also, there are other leaders and followers of this plan.{nl}
Yes, it was all thanks to you.{nl}Thank you so much... really.
People often ask me if I wouldn't be better off living as a descendant of a noble family.
{nl}But to me, studying the literature and researching Mage magic is much more worthy.{nl}Those are all things that made me grow and develop.
My mentor, the previous Sage Master passed away during Medzio Diena.{nl}I didn't exactly inherit the position officially.
{nl}After Medzio Diena, the school of Sage magic was nearly eradicated.{nl}That's why rebuilding it now as the Sage Master is not an easy task.
{nl}Still, it is my goal to bring back the school of Sage magic in whatever way I can.{nl}I think of it as my mission as the current Sage Master.
Every single one of us possesses an inner divine trait, given to us by the goddesses.{nl}However, this inner divinity manifests only in a small minority.
{nl}Those in whom this divinity manifests will suffer and will hurt.{nl}Any mental or physical suffering experienced by the goddesses will reflect in these people.
{nl}Taoists are those who experience this pain through the manifestation of their inner divinity.
Taoists experience the suffering of the goddesses more than any other type of cleric.
However, I don't know what this poison is.{nl}But this dagger... How about you go meet the Ranger Master?
They're late. My colleagues went to the Ishigiti Herb Farm to defeat the Gorgon.{nl}I don't wanna think that they were annihilated.
You defeated the Gorgon yourself?{nl}It is fortunate that my colleagues are safe, but I don't know what they did as soldiers..{nl}
From now on, be careful when using shared equipment.{nl}Nonetheless, an impressive show of strength.
I can't believe I left Priest Pranas behind even if I was frightened by the demon...{nl}I don't deserve to be called a Chaser.
You'll need a lot of utilities on your travels like potions and such.{nl}Make sure to stop by often since I have the cheapest prices around.{nl}
Revelator? I don't know what you're talking about.{nl}Do you perhaps mean the people like the Bokors or Oracles?
It's been a while  since the prison was shut down, but the effects from the blessings are still there.{nl}Your powers as Revelator should be enough to liberate that energy.
I am sorry. I cannot announce that demons have come this close to the city.{nl}I hope that you will understand the fact that I cannot spread confusion and fear among my people.{nl}
I, as the Highlander Submaster, am helping the immigrants the best I can...{nl}I am   worried if the migration orders aren't a big burden to the lord.
Just remember...  You'll have to start from the beginning if you become incapacitated.{nl}I will not accept any results that come from working with colleagues.{nl}
Look for Sparnasman in Novaha Annex.{nl}Its horns are the materials that I've been looking for so be careful please.
You've done better than any of my expectations.{nl}Now vow to fight for the goddesses as a Paladin for your faith and justice.
I was once a mage under Delmore Rephaim as well.{nl}But I ran after seeing him create the Kruvina, which simply made me feel sick.{nl}
Those amplifiers have given us a lot of trouble, {nl}but as a Sapper I can't help but take an interest in them.{nl}Would you collect some for me?{nl}
If you ever go to Carlyle's Mausoleum, be careful about them.{nl}No matter how much I think about it, they are not in their right minds.
We want to ask for help, too. We want it more than anyone.{nl}Be it Orsha... or Fedimian, which is closer... But that's just something we can't do.{nl}
It seems to be inactive now.
The device gives off a warm, but dangerous feel.
Oh, you're a Revelator!{nl}
Ah...{nl}This is what Goddess Dalia foresaw...
{nl}I am Kupole Medena,?I protect the Tevhrin Stalactite Caves.
{nl}Revelator.{nl}Please, save Goddess Dalia.
Come with me to Tevhrin Stalactite Cave Section 1.{nl}I will tell you there.
Revelator, you came.{nl}The day that Goddess Dalia foresaw has finally come.
Dalia, the goddess behind the fate of humans, is trapped here in the Tevhrin Stalactite Cave.{nl}She was caught in a demon conspiracy and now possesses the power of chaos.
{nl}But the power of chaos is far too strong and dangerous, and has taken over the Goddess.{nl}The immense power contained in Her could destroy the entire world...
{nl}That is why we had no choice but to keep Goddess Dalia in the cave.{nl}The other Kupoles and I are here making sure She does not break loose of Her seal.
{nl}Not long ago, however, the demons broke into the caves.{nl}We believe they want to break the Goddess' seal and use Her power of chaos.
{nl}But Goddess Dalia already predicted the existence of a Revelator.{nl}That a Revelator will soon appear at the Tevhrin Stalactite Cave...
{nl}I was searching for that very Revelator.{nl}But it seems the demons' side became stronger while I was away.
{nl}The Tala tribe are also joining their forces and causing chaos.{nl}I think it would be wise to reduce their numbers first.
I am glad Goddess Dalia was not mistaken in Her prophecy...
This will not do.{nl}The Tala and the demons are still causing chaos and there's nothing we can do to stop them.{nl}I'm worried that they may have already broken the goddess' seal.
There's a magic circle in the Abmathai Vacant Lot that leads to Goddess Dalia.{nl}You should meet Kupole Trija?there.
I think I've found the Teleportation Magic Circle.
Please, let Goddess Dalia be safe...
{nl}This is odd...{nl}The magic circle has lost its light...{nl}
Something is sure to have happened.{nl}I need to ask Kupole Trija.
Ah... If Medena brought you here...{nl}Are you perhaps the Revelator?{nl}
Goddess Dalia's prophecy was right!{nl}Bless you.
It won't be easy collecting all the pieces.{nl}If possible, gather the bigger ones first.{nl}Revelator...
You're back already.{nl}Let me have them.{nl}I'll have a look at them now.
Oh... It seems... The Magic Core pieces you brought back no longer have magic in them.{nl}I wonder if the core's magic was absorbed by the demons when it broke...{nl}
We can't move with the magic circle on an empty magic core.{nl}Altough you might be able to make the core absorb more magic from defeated monsters.
Even a small amount of magic would help.{nl}Please defeat Green Flak monsters to recover the core's magic.
Oh, this is demon essence...{nl}You collected this much from hunting Green Flak monsters?
{nl}It seems the core has absorbed their essence.{nl}Well, I didn't expect it to recover on pure magic.
We should be able to use the demon essence on the magic core if we purify it.{nl}The Altar of Purification of Thyras Sanctuary ought to work.
{nl}On the other hand, I'm afraid the essence could break from the purifying energy.{nl}In that case, you will need to gather more Green Flak essence.
Even with the purification, having to use demon essence...{nl}Makes me feel a little uneasy... but I guess there's no other choice.
The demon essence looks free of all evil energy.{nl}You did well.
We should be able to use the purified demon essence now.{nl}I'll leave it to Medena.{nl}
Keep in mind, however, that if the demons notice that the Teleportation Magic Circle is restored, they will try to destroy it again.{nl}If they do, you will have to protect us.
Will Trija?use the magic core the way we want, however...? I'm worried, but we must try and convince her.
Thanks to you we were able to restore the Teleportation Magic Circle.{nl}And yet it seems like using magic absorbed by demons was a problem, even after the purification.{nl}
The Magic Core is too unstable for us to use the magic circle right away.{nl}And by the looks of it, it could be a while before it fully stabilizes...
It's a shame we can't use the Teleportation Magic Circle yet...{nl}But we can't just wait around for it to become activated again.
{nl}If Goddess Dalia's seal is broken meanwhile, it will be a disaster.{nl}If we can't use the magic circle, we should move there in whatever way we can.
{nl}It will take some time but...{nl}If we take Lhysis Pathway we'll arrive at Section 2.
It looks like someone blocked the way on purpose.
To tell you the truth, I'm not sure what will happen if Goddess Dalia's seal is broken either.{nl}All I know is that a terrible catastrophe will happen.
Oh no...{nl}It looks like the demons have blocked the way.
Hm...
{nl}There is another way.{nl}We could bring the magic core of the magic circle we restored over here.{nl}
Using the unstable magic core as a catalyst, then adding some divine energy, we can create an explosion.{nl}It should be enough to open up a path for us.
{nl}I can't tell whether Trija will give us the magic core willingly, but it's the only way we have now.{nl}
What?
{nl}She wants to blow up an unstable magic core??{nl}I know it's urgent, but that sounds too dangerous.
And we shouldn't use the magic core we restored like that...{nl}We may never be able to use the Teleportation Magic Circle again.{nl}We can't do that.
I just pray that Goddess Dalia is safe...
I knew that much power would open up a path for us.{nl}Hurry and move to Section 2.
Please, you must save Goddess Dalia.
That is true... This magic circle leads directly to Goddess Dalia...{nl}So if She were to be in danger, this magic circle wouldn't help us either way...{nl}
... alright. {nl}Take the unstable magic core.{nl}Instead, you must tell me about Goddess Dalia's condition.
Revelator, thank you for rescuing Goddess Dalia.{nl}Although only Her spirit remains, I believe this would have been Her choice, too.
{nl}The goddess may no longer be with us, but I will always protect this place.{nl}The demons are still attempting to take over, and the Tala are causing chaos as well.
{nl}The Tala were a good-natured tribe before the demons arrived.{nl}After the demons came, I noticed their necklaces seem to have turned black.
{nl}I think the evil energy of the demons in their necklaces is what made them turn violent.{nl}
I will give you some Sleep Powder to use on the Tala.{nl}Make them fall asleep and collect some of their necklaces.
If we leave them be, they will only keep harming us.
Thank you.{nl}As I thought, the necklaces feel evil.
It's possible the necklaces can also be purified at the Thyras Sanctuary's Altar of Purification.{nl}It is said the gem in the original Tala necklaces glows a beautiful blue.{nl}
Go to the Altar of Purification and return the necklaces to their original form.
I don't think the necklaces will break this time.{nl}They may be contaminated with demon magic, but they aren't evil themselves.
This is it.{nl}The blue glow.{nl}This is the color of the original Tala necklaces.
It's time to return the purified necklaces to the Tala tribe.{nl}Find a way to place the necklaces on them again.
{nl}My guess is that they will become harmless again once they have the purified necklaces.
Remember to avoid harming them.{nl}It's the demons who are evil.
Do you mean the Tala stopped attacking after you gave them the necklaces?{nl}Thank you.{nl}Thanks to you the Tala tribe are back to who they were again.
That's odd...{nl}I don't feel the energy of the Kupole that guards this place... Alena...
{nl}Something must have happened to Alena!{nl}We need to go to Vienas Vacant Lot!
I think I've found Alena.
Kupole Alena
Medena... It's you...{nl}I'm so sorry.{nl}I couldn't protect this place...
{nl}Ah, you brought... the Revelator.
I was fighting off the demons attacking Section 2 with Serija.{nl}Suddenly more and more demons and monsters started to appear and...
{nl}The monsters haven't stopped using binding magic in this area; I can't break free from it.{nl}Please, defeat some monsters wandering around me.
{nl}Aim for the demon monsters and the Tala, who seem to be under their control...{nl}If you defeat them I can break free from their binding magic.
I'm worried for Serija.{nl}She was with me when we were being attacked...
Thank you.{nl}I was finally able to break free from the binding magic.
But I believe the weak Kupole energy felt here belongs to Serija.{nl}All the demons did to me was keep me trapped here.
{nl}But Serija, they took her. They wanted to break Goddess Dalia's seal without interference, you see.{nl}They must have taken her to Section 2 somewhere...
The Kupole in sight seems to be Serija.
Please save Serija.{nl}I feel her energy weaken and I'm worried for her.
That's her! The Kupole trapped there, it's Serija!{nl}
Serija!{nl}What happened...
This voice... Medena... Medena, is that you?{nl}You're back...{nl}
Then the person with you right now is the Revelator?
It wasn't long after Medena?left the Tevhrin Stalactite Cave to go searching for the Revelator.{nl}Crowds of demons started to invade this place.
{nl}They restrained me and interrogated me about how to break Goddess Dalia's seal.{nl}But I wouldn't tell them, so they went to look for the goddess themselves.
{nl}I'm so worried for Goddess Dalia.{nl}The restraining device keeping me trapped should be around here somewhere.
{nl}Please, destroy the device.{nl}I must find if Goddess Dalia is safe...!
You should be able to destroy the other devices with ease now.{nl}Please hurry!
The devices are weaker than expected.{nl}Are they underestimating the power of the Kupoles?
There's only one left now.{nl}It looked much stronger than the other devices you destroyed, however...
Just hold on a little longer.{nl}Soon we can save Serija.
I no longer feel any evil energy{nl}Serija should be free now...
{nl}But Serija's energy still feels very weak.{nl}If she's free, she's probably too weak to move properly, I suppose.
Materializing flowing energy is not an easy task.{nl}But I can help you, don't worry.
Materialized recovery...{nl}Thank you.{nl}I can move better now, we should go find the goddess.
We need to free Serija first...{nl}What should we do...?
That's brilliant!{nl}Any demon-made object will react to my divine energy, then it will be easier to destroy them!
As long as their evil energy is not too strong, my divine force might just be enough to destroy the devices.
These are the devices keeping Serija trapped, like you thought.{nl}They aren't as strong as I imagined.
Goddess Dalia is in Section 3.{nl}We have no more time to waste now.{nl}
We can get to Section 3 if we cross Sjeti Pathway.{nl}I'll go first, you can meet me in Section 3 with Medena.
Please hurry.{nl}And don't forget to be careful.{nl}We can't let the demons know where the goddess is.
Right...
{nl}I think I've got it.{nl}If the devices are running on evil energy, that means enough of it must be already stored inside them, right?{nl}
If so, we can take the demons' magic stones and add more energy to the device.{nl}Add enough evil energy to them and they'll overload.
I just can't forgive them.{nl}Not the monsters who attacked and trapped me.{nl}
Please clear out some monsters on your way there.{nl}I'm afraid they'll only create more problems if we let them be.
I'm sure they'll be nothing but trouble if we don't get rid of them.
I was around the monsters for too long, it seems.{nl}My energy is not what it was anymore.{nl}
There's a Holy Place of Recovery in Antra Vacant Lot.{nl}If you find out a way to materialize energy, you can materialize healing energy there.
Medena knows how to materialize healing energy, so I'm not worried.
That's impressive.{nl}I know materializing healing energy is no easy task for humans...
This healing energy...{nl}Thank you.
Before we move to where the goddess is...{nl}We need to deal with the demons and monsters here.{nl}
If they've seen us, they'll tell the others about it{nl}We need to reduce their numbers before we take the next step.
We cannot let them know about us.{nl}Please, take care of them.
Thank you.{nl}But there's still a problem.
You may be the Revelator, but you're still a human...{nl}It's easy for even Kupoles to lose themselves to the power of chaos surrounding Goddess Dalia.
{nl}Go to Protas Sanctum and you will see several magic circles there.{nl}Step on the magic circles to receive protection.
{nl}Their magic will protect you from the power of chaos, but one circle will not be enough.{nl}To receive full protection, you must step on all the magic circles.
{nl}After you receive the protective magic, come back to meet the goddess.
The Kupoles will also receive the protective magic.{nl}We should each charge our necklaces with it.
Good.{nl}You seem fully protected.{nl}We're ready to meet Goddess Dalia.
We'll move to the spot where Goddess Dalia is now.{nl}We'll move separately to avoid getting caught by the demons.{nl}
I'll go first. You and Medena can meet me at the site of the Luonisz Seal.
I'm glad you're here.{nl}But we have a problem.
Kupole Siute?is in charge of protecting the site of the seal.{nl}But for some reason she's not answering to my voice.
{nl}We need Siute to disable the barrier for us, I wonder what happened...{nl}We might have to disable the barrier ourselves.
{nl}There are lockout devices installed on the Slepus Seal, the Phromba Seal and the Pourma Seal, one in each.{nl}If all three devices are activated, we can disable the barrier from the outside.
{nl}Each lockout device must be activated less than one minute after the previous one, or they will all shut down.{nl}I'll stay and make sure the demons can't pass through here.
If one minute passes after you activate the first device, you will have to activate them all again.{nl}Don't forget.
Well done.{nl}Now all that's left is disabling the barrier.
Goddess Dalia is beyond this barrier.{nl}Don't get too close to Her, she can't tell allies from enemies.{nl}
Well, then... are you ready to meet the goddess?
How did you purify Siute's darkness...?{nl}Could it be...
{nl}With you here, we might really be able to save the goddess...
In the past, all the Kupoles protecting Goddess Dalia gathered here to join our divine forces.{nl}All of our energy, all of our strength was poured here.

{nl}At the time the goddess regained her senses for a moment, and She predicted the arrival of a Revelator at Tevhrin Stalactite Cave.{nl}Then, She was taken once again by Giltine's evil energy and returned to Her state of chaos.
{nl}She... never came back to her senses after that...{nl}She hasn't reacted to our divine forces anymore...
{nl}But She might react to your energy, Revelator.{nl}Your energy had the power to purify Siute's darkness, it could be possible.
{nl}That is why I'm asking you.{nl}I'm going to prepare the same ceremony we performed then, and I want you to lend us your energy..
Dalia?{nl}Our goddess... Do you hear me?{nl}Do you recognize me?
Goddess Dalia's senses have returned!{nl}I knew we could count on you, Revelator.{nl}
Goddess Dalia controls the fate of humans...{nl}I am sure She will want to speak to you, Revelator.{nl}
You may approach Her now.
Please, rid this place of the demons and save Goddess Dalia.
This place is...{nl}Flooded with demon energy...
{nl}I will be taken by the power of chaos once more and the seal will be broken.{nl}Then, a new catastrophe will fall upon humanity...{nl}You must run, run far away...
We know Giltine's evil energy is growing again in Goddess Dalia.{nl}Soon She will once again be taken by the power of chaos and lose Her senses to it.
{nl}But we can slow down the process.{nl}Our devices run on divine energy, which means there is a high amount of it running through the ground.
{nl}The divine energy makes glowing moss grow in these caves.{nl}This glowing moss itself is imbued with divine energy.
{nl}Bring me some of this glowing moss.{nl}The divine energy in it is sure to have an effect.
The monsters dislike divine energy and will destroy any rocks where the moss grows.{nl}Be careful.
Serija's voice is heard, crying out from somewhere.
Dalia! Goddess Dalia!{nl}No... No...! What have the demons done...{nl}Nooo!
Dalia... Our goddess...{nl}We must save Her...{nl}
If Dalia's seal is broken, the world will... it will...
We must find Goddess Dalia...{nl}Where could the demons have taken Her...
Serija... She must be hurt... In her condition...{nl}She must have gone to Section 4.{nl}
If the demons had ran away to Section 3, I would have heard about it from the other sisters.{nl}I'm worried for Serija. We should go after her.
This voice...{nl}It's her... It's Serija's voice...{nl}
The power of Giltine around me is weaker now...{nl}What happened?
Serija suddenly disappeared.
With Goddess Dalia's sacrifice we were able to stop Gesti, but the demons are still invading.{nl}We must protect this place, we can't let the goddess' sacrifice be in vain.
{nl}I'm so sorry to ask, but will you do something for me?{nl}I was injured when the demons attacked to take Goddess Dalia and it's hard to move.
{nl}I don't think I can take the demons in Section 3 yet.{nl}I'm going to need you to clear out some out of the way.
The pendants of the Kupoles who live here are imbued with protective magic to fight off the demons.{nl}That's the only way we can face their evil energy.
But with the constant demon attacks, I haven't been able to recharge my pendant.{nl}Can I ask you to replenish the protective magic of my pendant?
Thank you.{nl}I won't need to worry for a while now.
Wait there, Alena.{nl}We will save you.
Serija is the one in charge of the Kupoles here at the Tevhrin Stalactite Cave, she can take care of herself...{nl}But this time the demons and monsters were just too many...
{nl}They must have taken her to Section 2...
Ah...! No! Serija!{nl}Wait!!{nl}
You can't save Goddess Dalia like that!
We need to release Serija and go see the goddess immediately.
You did well for your first time!{nl}Now we just need to tell Serija.
We need to save Goddess Dalia...{nl}Where could She be...{nl}
The day the goddess' seal is broken...{nl}The catastrophe of 600 years ago will once again take over our world...
I saw them take the goddess away and there was nothing I could do...{nl}I feel pathetic...
I don't think we'll be able to find Her here, not like this...{nl}Where could the demons have taken Her?{nl}
However... I know now.{nl}I know how the demons' numbers were able to rise so fast is so little time.
They created portals in the Tevhrin Stalactite Cave when Section 4 was empty.{nl}If we leave that portal alone, soon they will occupy the entire cave.{nl}
We should close the portals before we go back to Serija.
We need to keep an eye on them at all times.
This will reduce the flow of demons into the cave.{nl}Let's go back to Serija now.
While you and Medena were searching for the goddess I had time to calm down and reflect.{nl}I don't think we can find the demons who took the goddess without a plan.
The demon monsters in here must know where She is.{nl}I think we need to read their memories from their spirits...
{nl}Demon spirits are pure evil and can overtake the conscience of Kupoles.{nl}That's why we use cores to suppress and absorb evil when we read the minds of demons.
{nl}The cores of Green Zolems should do the trick.{nl}It's possible that their cores are contaminated with evil demon energy, so we may have to purify them first.
The Green Zolem cores are likely contaminated with evil demon energy.{nl}We need to purify them before we add divine energy to them.
{nl}Only then can we use them to suppress evil energy.
You've brought the cores.{nl}Thank you.
As I thought, the cores are imbued with evil energy...{nl}We'll need to purify them first.{nl}But for that, we'll need a lot of divine energy.{nl}
The problem is that using that much divine energy will get the monsters' attention.{nl}I'll need you to take care of any monsters that might attack.
With your help, the divine core is complete.{nl}This should suppress the demons' evil energy for a while.
Here, take the divine core.{nl}Use it against demon monsters to suppress and absorb their evil energy.{nl}
Defeat the demons once you see their evil energy has disappeared.{nl}Then, Medena will read their spirits and find out where the goddess is.
Like I said before, reading demon spirits isn't that simple.{nl}Medena will be in danger.{nl}
The demons' memories must be accessed only after the core suppresses their evil energy.
So that's what the demons were plotting...{nl}But something doesn't seem right.{nl}
It took a good amount of effort for past Demon Kings to seal Goddess Dalia.{nl}A regular demon shouldn't be able to break the seal...
What I know for sure is that they took Goddess Dalia to Section 5.{nl}Let's not waste any more time and hurry.{nl}
You need to go, now!
Only you can save Goddess Dalia.
That was close.{nl}I never thought they would open the portals for an ambush...{nl}
We must be going in the right direction.{nl}I can feel the demons' power grow stronger.
This kind of interference was to be expected.{nl}The goddess will be waiting for us.{nl}
Hurry and go.
We're almost in Section 5.{nl}Be strong.
Thank you.{nl}I knew you would make it.
{nl}So this is what it feels like to be surrounded by evil energy...{nl}I feel so uneasy, how could Siute endure this?
{nl}This... is bad...{nl}Something terrifying was about to happen, something much worse than I imagined...
I couldn't get the exact location of the goddess from the memories of those demons but...{nl}Something big... was on its way to the Tevhrin Stalactite Cave...
{nl}It felt strange and frightening... Something this powerful... It can only be one of three beings.{nl}The three Demon Kings... Giltine's Demon Kings and Queen...{nl}Kartas,?Vaiga and Gesti...
{nl}We can't face them like this.{nl}We must return to Serija and ask her what to do.
You say one of the three Demon Kings is coming to the Tevhrin Stalactite Cave?{nl}Oh... I see...
{nl}I understand now...{nl}There was no way a group of lower demons could break the goddess' seal...
{nl}Only a Demon King would be powerful enough to break the seal.{nl}But what about the power of chaos...?
{nl}There's only one way we can stop them.
{nl}The day Goddess Saule entrusted the Kupoles with Dalia, She created a divine orb.{nl}The orb has the power to control the seal, in the event of any danger.
{nl}But as Goddess Saule lost Her power, so did the orb weaken.{nl}If only we can restore its strength, the seal will close itself again, even if a Demon King succeeds in opening it.
{nl}Revelator, I will give you the divine orb. Go find Goddess Saule in Septyni Glen.{nl}She will tell you how to recover the orb's power.
Serija should know what to do.
This... is the orb I gave Serija when I left the Tevhrin Stalactite Cave...{nl}Does this mean the demons are trying to break Dalia's seal?
{nl}A Demon King, you say...{nl}This weakened orb won't be able to stand against the power of a Demon King.
Goddess Saule Herself might not be able to fix the orb.{nl}But She is the only one we can count on now.
Septyni Glen...{nl}I don't think I can make it that far from here.{nl}I'm afraid you must go there alone.
I cannot restore the orb as I am still recovering my powers.{nl}However, my energy trapped at the Forest of Thorns is starting free itself.
{nl}You will feel my energy near the Gate Route.{nl}Have the divine orb absorb it and it shall be recovered.
I don't want to rush you, but time is scarce.{nl}Should Dalia's seal be broken, an immense disaster will take over our world.
You have done well.{nl}The divine orb and its restored power will help you face the Demon King.{nl}
However, the fact remains that the orb itself is weakened.{nl}You will have one chance... One chance alone to use the power of the divine orb.
You may use the orb to strengthen Dalia's seal.{nl}Or you may use its power to face the Demon King approaching.{nl}
The divine orb may be used for one, and only one of these tasks...{nl}May you use it wisely and save Dalia, save our world.
You've restored the divine orb.{nl}It's a shame it can't be used more than once but...{nl}
We may only have one chance to use the orb, but its power will be enough to face the Demon King.{nl}Take the orb and stop the demons, save Goddess Dalia.
It came to Section 5, where the goddess is.{nl}I expect the demons to increase their attack.{nl}
We should clear out as many demons as we can before they attack.{nl}It'll be easier to face them if we reduce their numbers.
They're resilient creatures.
We'll never get rid of them this way.{nl}We should find the goddess first!
There's no way to tell exactly where She is...{nl}We need to search the entire Section 5.
After we find Dalia...{nl}There will be no mercy for these demons.
This evil aura... It can only be a demon barrier.{nl}If they made a barrier here, that means Dalia will be on the other side.
But how to disable it... Other than the demons, only Dalia Herself will know...
I knew the evil energy around here was too intense...{nl}It was an evil statue the demons erected.
It's true we didn't see anything on our way here...{nl}They must have concealed the statue with magic.{nl}
I have a Magic Searching Stone.{nl}We can use it to find objects hidden with magic.
We must hurry, before the goddess loses her senses.
This is odd.{nl}We destroyed the statue, but the evil energy remains.
No... Wait... It's not that the evil energy didn't go away.{nl}What I'm feeling now is a much more powerful energy!{nl}
To the Punctas Vacant Lot!
That was the last of the demons that took Goddess Dalia away.
The bad energy has disappeared!{nl}Now we need to stop the demons from doing any more evil deeds.
{nl}Each section of the Tevhrin Stalactite Cave has an exorcising device for demons.{nl}I guess we'll need to use those...
{nl}The device in Section 5 is a little different, though.{nl}It is very powerful, but just as dangerous. Activating it won't be easy.
{nl}This exorcising device must be activated by turning on two secondary devices.{nl}One is at the Auckste Vacant Lot, the other at the Apateen Vacant Lot.
Goddess Saule said she feared the predictions of Goddess Laima would come true.{nl}I wonder if She foresaw Dalia being held captive here as well.
This will put a stop to the demons' antics!
All we need is to activate the Central Exorcising Device now!
Let's go save Goddess Dalia!
Hurry.{nl}Before the Demon King arrives!
You are just in time, Revelator.{nl}I am glad you came.
Give me the orb with Saule's energy.{nl}The divine orb is an object of the goddesses... Its power will multiply in my hands.{nl}
With the power of the divine orb, I will put an end to this tiresome war.
Goddess Dalia!!{nl}Dalia... She and Gesti...{nl}Our Dalia...
Dalia... Why did She do it...{nl}If I knew this was Her plan all along... I would never have complied with Her...{nl}Why, oh why... Why did She sacrifice Herself...?
I can only thank you, Revelator.{nl}It was with your help that we defeated Gesti.{nl}
I'm sure there was a reason for Dalia's decision...{nl}Her noble sacrifice will never be forgotten.{nl}
And Dalia's body may have been sacrificed, but Her spirit lives on.{nl}Someday, maybe, She might even be revived.{nl}
If you can, go and see the other Kupoles before you leave Tevhrin Stalactite Cave.{nl}I'm sure they will want to say goodbye to you, Revelator.
Strangely, I can't seem to feel Dalia's spirit.{nl}Part of Her spirit must have become scattered with Gesti's attack.{nl}
I still have the Magic Searching Stone.{nl}Please take it and find Dalia's spirit.
You'll be able to communicate with Her spirit once you collect it in its entirety.
Dalia's Spirit
Savior... I commend you.{nl}Do not grieve for my sacrifice, for it was my own inescapable fate.
The curse on my right arm would forever have imparted Giltine's cruel magic in me.{nl}Abandoning my physical body was the only chance to escape it.{nl}
Gesti may have been defeated, but the power of chaos will return to obscure me.{nl}When it does, Giltine will seek me.{nl}
The world will once again be endangered, as it did when the power of chaos first took over me.{nl}So you must not grieve...
You may speak to Dalia's spirit now.
It looks like the statues we destroyed were hiding an energy even more powerful.
Thank you, Savior.{nl}But our Tevhrin Stalactite Cave is still plagued with wandering monsters.
{nl}I would like to ask your help in ridding Tevhrin Stalactite Cave of them.{nl}It would be a good idea to start with the Green Zolems.
These caves have been defiled by the demons and the monsters who helped them.{nl}What they did is unforgivable...
Trija... we must think carefully.{nl}The demons could be on their way to Goddess Dalia as we speak.
{nl}What good is it if Goddess Dalia is in danger?{nl}Please, give the Revelator the magic core, for Dalia's sake.
We may have thwarted the demons' plans, but the monsters are still on their side.{nl}I think it's because of the energy of their evil talismans.
{nl}Please defeat the demons and take their talismans.
The demons' evil talismans.
Thank you.{nl} you were a great help in stabilizing the Tevhrin Stalactite Cave.
Something's happened.{nl}I feel an unstable energy taking over Section 4 of Tevhrin Stalactite Cave.{nl}
I think the demons have reopened the portals there.{nl}Would you go and check whether the portals are open again?
What are they searching that makes them so persistent?
Thank you.{nl}We'd be in deep trouble if the portals hadn't been closed in time.
So, did you find anything?{nl}A picture? What is it?{nl}
If you say no one was there, I bet Lina sent you here and ran off.{nl}She probably filled the Pharaz Vacant Lot with her supplements again.{nl}
Go there and get rid of the supplements.{nl}I'll go look somewhere else.
Good.{nl}I'm counting on you.{nl}
Hurry and get rid of Lina's mess!
Hurry up.{nl}We don't what else Lina is up to.
The place was filled with supplements?{nl}I knew it.{nl}
Seriously, the more you get rid of them, the more they pop up.{nl}We'll never clean up Lina's mess at this pace.{nl}
It's been four years, I'm at my limit.{nl}Anyway, thanks for your help.
You met Aeglei?{nl}Aeglei must have wanted to sabotage me.{nl}
I really don't understand these people!{nl}What is this talk about the vegetation...{nl}
Everything is dying.{nl}Do you deny it?{nl}
I really can't understand.
You think Aeglei may be right??{nl}
It... can't be true...{nl}We have to save the dying forest...{nl}
The whole forest will die if Aeglei keeps interfering...{nl}Don't you understand that?
How can you be such an idiot?{nl}I'm telling you were barely stopped the excessive vegetation and you want to save it?{nl}
You're just going to make it grow even more.
Traveller, what do you say?{nl}Am I right, or is Aeglei?
What do you mean?{nl}Aeglei and I... there's no way we can be the same, is there?
The leaves of this forest have been falling since Medzio Diena...{nl}It was hard dealing with my wish to save the forest and my worries about the vegetation...
{nl}I must have started to worry more about the forest at some point...{nl}I guess the part of me still worried for the vegetation is what turned into Aeglei...
{nl}As we became two, we started to disagree.{nl}We only ever disagreed about saving the forest, however...{nl}And I knew her, despite never having seen nor met with her...
If our constant fights were keeping the balance in the forest...{nl}Maybe living as two different people isn't such a bad thing.{nl}
Aeglei will try to stop me if I do too much.{nl}We need to find balance between us in a way that won't harm the refugees.{nl}
However, may I ask you for one last favor before you leave?{nl}

I have a Magic Sphere I've been meaning to finish, that will allow me to communicate with the other Kupoles.{nl}But I'm a little short on materials.{nl}I was busy making my supplements, I had no time for it.
Thanks!{nl}You can use this to paralyze Rodejokel monsters around here and collect their essence!{nl}
Just remember that you need to weaken them first, otherwise the paralyzing drug won't work!
Thanks a lot, pal!{nl}Just weaken the Rodejokels and use the drug to paralyze them!{nl}
After that you just need to take their essence.
You're back.{nl}Thank you.
So you destroy all my supplement bottles to interfere with my plans?{nl}Do you know what you're doing?...{nl}
You're turning your back on our dying forest!
Are you saying Lina and I are in the same body?{nl}Me and that idiot?{nl}
{nl}The same idiot trying to save the forest and forgetting about our little vegetation problem...?
I'm so confused...{nl}I can't believe Aeglei and I are the same person...{nl}
All this time I've been fighting with her to save the forest...{nl}And we're one and the same...?
Sigh... I don't know if Lina is naive or just dumb.{nl}I was wondering why the Magic Sphere wouldn't activate even with the essence and - surprise - it's Lina's fault.{nl}
She said she had everything but the essence. Well guess what, she forgot the glimmering powder.
I'm sorry.{nl}I must have forgotten about it...{nl}
May I ask you one more favor?{nl}Will you get some glimmering powder from Nuttafly monsters?{nl}I need that powder to finish the Magic Sphere.
I completely forgot about it.{nl}Please, do me this one last favor.
Thank you for your help.{nl}With this I can finally speak with the other Kupoles.{nl}
I want to ask the other Kupoles for advice on what to do about my situation with Aeglei.{nl}Thanks to your help we solved our problem and finished the Magic Sphere.{nl}
I'm very grateful.

I'll take care of the monsters and the Tala.
I don't think I'm the savior you're looking for.

I really don't think I'm the savior you're looking for.

I can't; it's too dangerous.

Let's get some rest first.

We should investigate the devices we found on our way here.

Let's destroy them.
I'm not so sure about this, sorry.
Kupole Rescue Mission (3)
Let's go, we can do this.
That's going to be difficult, sorry.
Overloading with magic...
Recovering Energy
Is there a way to restore Serija's energy?
I think my work here is done, goodbye.
Where is the Goddess
Blood Begets Blood
I'll defeat them.
Dwindling Energy
I'll be right back.
Less Eyes to See
Dangerous Encounter (1)
Dangerous Encounter (2)
Let's meet there.
I don't know where.
Dangerous Encounter (3)
I'll activate it.
Kupole in the Darkness (1)
Let's go in.
I'm too scared.

I don't think that's going to work.

I don't want to do that, I'm scared.
Deranged Goddess (2)
I don't think that'll be worth much.

The wounds look serious.
Despite Urgent Matters
Too Late Already
Before It's Too Late (1)
It's okay, I'll find Goddess Dalia.
I don't think I can find traces of the goddess.
Before It's Too Late (2)
That doesn't sound very useful.
They Hid Her (1)
I can do it.
I don't think so.
They Hid Her (2)
I don't have the power to do that.
They Hid Her (3)
I'll give it a try.
Is that even possible?
Transmitting read memories...
They Hid Her (4)
It will be hard to do it in these conditions.
I'll save the goddess with Medena.
They Hid Her (5)
Just wait a while.
Purifying the energy...
With the Power of the Goddess (1)
We should leave right away.
Let's rest first; then we can leave.
Explaining about the Demon Kings and asking what to do
Let me tell you what happened at Tevhrin Stalactite Cave.
With the Power of the Goddess (2)
I'll find it and repair it.
Just wait a little longer.
One Final Step
We should leave right away.
Let's go a bit later.
Showing the orb and relaying Saule's instructions...
Persistent Creatures
Nah, that won't happen.
Evil Talismans
No way that's going to happen.
Preemptive Defense
I'll close as much as I can.
I think we should stop here.
Reducing Numbers
The Place of the Hidden Goddess
Let's just look anywhere.
We should reduce the demons' numbers first.
Before the Demon King Arrives (1)
Is there any way we can do it?
Let's just give up on it.
Before the Demon King Arrives (2)
Before the Demon King Arrives (3)
I'm scared.
Destroying the evil statue...
Unexpected Weapon
Let's activate them.
Activating the exorcising device dealt a great amount of damage to the demons!
Powerful Being (1)
Powerful Being (2)
The Goddess' Sacrifice (1)
Use the Divine Orb.
Don't use the Divine Orb.
The Goddess' Sacrifice (2)
Be strong.
I'll wait until you've calmed down.
Her Last Words
Inserting the spirit...
Extremely Humanly
I'll solve it.
Hilda is back.{nl}Return to the Kupoles.
A Mediator is Born (2)
I'll go a bit later.
A Mediator is Born (3)
Let me have some rest first.
Plot Twist (1)
But what Aeglei said makes sense too.
I think Lina is right.
Plot Twist (2)
Are you fighting because of the leaves?
I keep hearing two Kupoles speaking from the same body.
Making the Magic Sphere (1)
I'll think about it.
